\section{topsys}

\paragraph{\index{init\_top}init\_top}
\begin{verbatim}
void init_top(int topt)
\end{verbatim}
Initializes the topsystem by pointing {\tt tstep\_top}, {\tt pre\_top}
and {\tt post\_top} to the functions determined by {\tt toptype}.

Values for topt in topsys.h



from: {\tt intopsys.c}

from file: {\tt doc}


\paragraph{\index{prtopsys}prtopsys}
\begin{verbatim}
void prtopsys(void)
\end{verbatim}

Prints all topsystems descriptions on {\tt stderr}



from: {\tt intopsys.c}

from file: {\tt doc}
